channel.title: Abishek Kumar on Data Day(s) 2021
channel.description: Recent content in Abishek Kumar on Data Day(s) 2021

item.title: Workshop: Using Istio
item.description: This workshop introduces service mesh concepts and each aspect of Istio. Gain hands-on experience with this popular tool as you learn how to deploy and configure Istio alongside microservices running in Kubernetes.
